prefix_prompt: You are an expert at understanding emotions of human texts.

seed_examples.example: i couldnt help but feel totally distraught and utterly helpless when lorena was kidnapped and tortured almost to death by a band of enemies i was desperate for her freedom
i mostly feel this as a cause of hateful memories of that girl who used to run the everchanging sailormoon gateway who i think is still making a name for herself by being stupid and mean
i feel about the plight of these dogs so its lovely to find a turkish vet who really cares
i see how strong and bright you are and as you meet your milestones weeks early i feel assured that my gut was always right
i am pinned as the culprit of digging out their inferiority and made them feel useless again
